channel.title: Post your riddles
channel.description:
[b]1.) [/b]What goes up a chimney down, but won't go down a chimney up?
[b]2.) [/b]Electric train, going north to south, what direction is the steam going?
Post some of your riddles.
[b]Rules[/b] No Googleing.

item.title: Post your riddles
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

All of these riddles are so obvious. Post some better ones please.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your riddles
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

[quote=“ChaosPkers, post:26, topic:318766”][quote author=wales 00 link=topic=415229.msg3059800#msg3059800 date=1260756991]

How far can you walk in a forest?

As far as you like.
[/quote]Halfway because once you get halfway, your now going out of the forest, not in.

EDIT: Ok, whoever gets this one is amazing. I’ll worship you if you get it. It’s so obvious yet no one gets it.

Ok, so your driving along in your car, it breaks down in an old run down neighborhood, and it’s raining out.

You have no phone to call for help, so you must go to a house to either A, use a phone or B, use it as shelter.

So you go inside an empty house, yet the power is out from the storm.

You find a single door in the house. You go into it and there is a crazy man for some reason and now wants to kill you for coming into his house.

Now, he lets you choose which way you get to die.

A. Gun

B. Knife

C. Drowning

D. Electric Chair

E. Torture

What do you choose?[/quote]
Electric chair yh lol best 1 xD

Read full topic

item.title: Post your riddles
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

It could be either, since it never asks which would let you survive

If the house is empty why is the man there?

The house has to have at least to doors, front and the room door.

if the house is empty there is no water

the power is out so you cant use power for electric chair

you cant die from torture

Read full topic

item.description:

you chose the electric chair since there is no power you would not die

easy

item.title: Post your riddles
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“wales 00, post:25, topic:318766”][quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=415229.msg3059798#msg3059798 date=1260756883]
How far can you walk in a forest?
[/quote]
As far as you like.[/quote]Halfway because once you get halfway, your now going out of the forest, not in.

EDIT: Ok, whoever gets this one is amazing. I’ll worship you if you get it. It’s so obvious yet no one gets it.

Ok, so your driving along in your car, it breaks down in an old run down neighborhood, and it’s raining out.

You have no phone to call for help, so you must go to a house to either A, use a phone or B, use it as shelter.

So you go inside an empty house, yet the power is out from the storm.

You find a single door in the house. You go into it and there is a crazy man for some reason and now wants to kill you for coming into his house.

Now, he lets you choose which way you get to die.

A. Gun

B. Knife

C. Drowning

D. Electric Chair

E. Torture

What do you choose?

Read full topic

item.title: Post your riddles
item.dc:creator: @wales_00 wales 00
item.description:
@wales_00 wrote:

Thank you Si Force.

[quote=“Jc22493, post:2, topic:318766”]1) An umbrella.
2) It’s an electric train. No smoke.

Those were very easy. ;)[/quote]

They are easy, but if you say 1 fast it’s hard to understand.

3.) In the garden there’s a park, in the park there’s a lake, in the lake there’s a boat, in the boat there’s a lady in a read fluffy coat. An her name is somewhere in the riddle, what is it?

^^ Very easy.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your riddles
item.dc:creator: @sick_sub1 sick sub1
item.description:
@sick_sub1 wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:5, topic:318766”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=415229.msg3056276#msg3056276 date=1260495752]
2) It’s an electric train. No smoke.
[/quote]
The espresso machine in most food carriages create steam therefore the steam is North.

You are walking back from a place and you forget how to get back home. You encounter path which splits into two paths going in two different directions. One path leads you home, the other will lead you to certain death. By this junction are two sisters; one is always telling the truth, one always lies. You can only ask ONE question to both of them(same question) to find out how to get home. What is this question?

kingjamie, you’re wrong.[/quote]

The path one, ive heard it b4 its like you ask the sister which way would your sister tell me to go and go the opposite way.

Read full topic

item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:7, topic:318766”][quote author=sick sub1 link=topic=415229.msg3056670#msg3056670 date=1260528939]
This one is easy if you think about it

You are lost in the forest and come across a cabin. You need some heat to last the night. You find a fireplace with logs, an oil lamp and a candle but only have one match, what do you light first?
[/quote]
The oil lamp.[/quote]
Lol’z how did you light the lamp?
